title: Perfect rhubarb cake
ingredients: ['140g margarine, at room temperature', '150g golden caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '110g self raising flour', '200g ground almonds', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '4 stalks rhubarb, finely chopped', '55g flaked almonds', '2 tablespoons rhubarb jam']
